scripts.build: cargo build --release && cp target/release/libride_security.dylib ../../ride-security.darwin-arm64.node 2>/dev/null; cp target/release/libride_security.so ../../ride-security.linux-x64-gnu.node 2>/dev/null; cp target/release/ride_security.dll ../../ride-security.win32-x64-msvc.node 2>/dev/null; echo 'Build complete'
